rule.message: Apex unit test classes should have at least one System.assert() or assertEquals() or AssertNotEquals() call

rule.name: AvoidProductionDebugLogs
rule.message: Avoid leaving System.debug() statments in code as they negativly influence performance.

rule.name: NullValueCheckBeforeEmptyCheck
rule.message: Apex code must check != null before .isEmpty()

rule.name: BumpApiVersion
rule.message: Metadata should use the latest API version.

rule.name: DMLStatementInFlowLoop
rule.message: DML Operations shouldn't be done inside of Flow loops

rule.name: MetadataRequiresDescription
rule.message: Add a description to explain custom metadata

rule.name: FieldsMustHaveTypePrefix
rule.message: Field API names need a 3 letter type prefix.

property.name: xpath
property.value: //CustomField/fullName[ (.[not(starts-with(text,"chk_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="Checkbox"]) or (.[not(starts-with(text,"txt_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="Text"]) or (.[not(starts-with(text,"txa_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="Textarea"]) or (.[not(starts-with(text,"txr_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="Richtext"]) or (.[not(starts-with(text,"txl_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="LongTextArea"]) or (.[not(starts-with(text,"num_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="Number"]) or (.[not(starts-with(text,"dat_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="Date"]) or (.[not(starts-with(text,"lkp_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="Lookup"]) or (.[not(starts-with(text,"mdr_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="MasterDetail"]) or (.[not(starts-with(text,"dtm_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="DateTime"]) or (.[not(starts-with(text,"url_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="Url"]) or (.[not(starts-with(text,"pkl_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="Picklist"]) or (.[not(starts-with(text,"pkm_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="MultiselectPicklist"]) or (.[not(starts-with(text,"cur_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="Currency"]) or (.[not(starts-with(text,"pct_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="Percent"]) or (.[not(starts-with(text,"fcur_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="Currency"]) or (.[not(starts-with(text,"rcnt_"))] and ../type/text[@Image="Summary"]) ]

rule.name: UnrestrictedPasswordPolicy
rule.message: It is a high security risk for any profile to have "No Restriction" as the password complexity requirement.

rule.name: TooShortPasswordPolicy
rule.message: The default value for the password length is 8 characters. Less than 8 characters is not secure.

rule.name: ModifyOrViewAllOnSysAdminProfile
rule.message: Only Admins can view and modify all data, if any other profile get these permissions, they could manipulate records that shouldn't

property.name: xpath
property.value: //Profile/userPermissions[ name/text[@Image='ModifyAllData' or @Image='ViewAllData'] and enabled/text[@Image='true'] and pmd:fileName() != 'System Administrator' ]

rule.name: ModifyOrViewAllOnPermSet
rule.message: Allowing this user permission can give access and ability to modify sensitive data.

rule.name: ManageUsersByNonSysAdmins
rule.message: Managing users need to be limited to System Administrator Profile only.

rule.name: TooLongSessionTimeout
rule.message: Allowing access to an inactive session for more than 12 hours is a security risk.

property.name: xpath
property.value: //SecuritySettings/sessionTimeout[ text[@Image='24 hours of inactivity'] or text[@Image='12 hours of inactivity'] ]

rule.name: PasswordsNeverExpire
rule.message: Passwords need to expire every 90 days for security.

rule.name: ViewSetupByNonSysAdmins
rule.message: Exposing the setup menu to non-authorized users.

property.name: xpath
property.value: //Profile/userPermissions[ pmd:fileName() != 'System Administrator' and enabled/text[@Image='true'] and name/text[@Image='ViewSetup'] ]
